data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon affecting the coast of southern China will moderate slightly in the next couple of days. Temperatures will rise slightly over the region, but it will still be cool in the morning. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to reach the coast of Guangdong later on Monday. It will become cold over the region midweek next week. The weather will be persistently fine and very dry with rather large temperature difference between day and night.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260104","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine.
